com.selesse.jxlint.model.rules

Class AbstractLintRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.selesse.jxlint.model.rules.AbstractLintRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LintRules

    public abstract class AbstractLintRules
extends java.lang.Object
implements LintRules
    Abstract LintRules. Provides most of the implementation that should be expected from LintRules. All the methods (except getLintRule(String)) assume that the elements are valid. In other words, calling getAllRulesExcept( { "rule1", "rule2" } ) assumes that these rules do exist and will fail silently if they don't.

    The program is expected to fail if these rules don't exist, specifically in ProgramOptions.getRuleListFromOptionString(String).
